author: Brad Hanscom
text:
Hello, 
I am looking for any examples of a county serving as webmaster  and/or hosting agent for a municipal web site. This could entail hosting the municipal website on county servers and/or arranging for county webmaster to create and modify the municipal web site template (or even the content).  I am trying to determine if there are municipalities that have partnered with counties in order to take advantage of economies of scale and save costs. 
Thank you.
title: Counties serving as webmaster for cities or towns
